thanks hey good morning Joe can I have my paints back what paints I don't have your paints hey wait you borrowed my paints I did
not hey tofu what happened that boy who calls himself Joe borrowed my paints yesterday but today he just denied it on
my face he says he doesn't have any paints oh no that's so bad he deceived you just like the sage was deceived by
the swindler the sage the swindler come on I will tell you a story as we walk home the foolish Sage once there was a wise and respected Sage
who lived in a far away Monastery people would offer him gifts food clothes and money to seek His blessings he accumulated a lot of wealth
by selling gifts that he did not need for himself he never trusted anybody so he put all his money in a bag which he carried with with him wherever he
went One Fine Day a cunning swindler noticed the sage and his bag ah that bag must contain something valuable I must find a way to steal it from the
sage the sage saw the strange man noticing him sharply and so he went ahead and questioned him my child why are you so troubled oh
guruji please guide me to the right path in life I am fed up with life and want to seek peace my son I will surely help you
you are blessed because you have come to me to seek peace at this young age oh guruji please accept me as your disciple
I will do whatever you ask me to do the sly swindler put up a good act and deceived the sage and so to guide and help the man
the sage asked the swindler to accompany him to his Monastery the sage was unaware of the intentions the swindler had in his
mind being a holy man I spend the night alone as I meditate so you will sleep in a hut at the Gate of the monastery the swi
did everything to prove himself as an obedient disciple but could not gain enough confidence of the sage to part with his bag when he was
around how can I snatch the bag from him stupid man never leaves the bag alone H it seems like I am wasting my time the
swindler thought of killing the sage with a knife or feed him with poison to get the bag but one day they came across
a young boy visiting the sage inviting him to come to his village and perform the sacred thread ceremony the sage
accepted the invitation and set out for the village taking the swindler with him on the way the sage suddenly had an
urge to pass he found a bush nearby and decided to go ahead please look after this until I return I must go and find a place to eliminate
myself the moment the sage went out of his sight the swindler finally found an opportunity and so he collected the bag and ran away as swiftly as he
could the sage returned only to find the man and the precious bag to be gone oh no you have robbed me you cheat come
back God will never forgive you for deceiving an innocent man the sage returned empty-handed to his Monastery the next morning realizing that he
should not have trusted anyone blindly oh foolish me how could I trust an unknown man like that oh my bag my possessions I like this story Tia I'm
I'm glad you did tofu do you understand the moral of the story yes the moral of the story is that you must not be taken away by the sweet words of
[Music]
anybody oh tofu I am so sorry but your project still isn't up to the mark you need to do better but miss Clary this is
the fourth time I made this project I know tofu but it needs some [Music] improvement tofu what's wrong dear I failed my science project for the fourth
time I don't think I can ever fulfill my dream of being a scientist oh tofu don't give up on your dream just because you couldn't get your project
passed you must stay consistent in working towards your goal no matter what that's exactly what princess Isabella did too princess Isabella yes
come on I'll tell you a story change your mood now princess Isabella [Music] Once Upon A Time In A Magical Kingdom
far away there lived a young princess named Isabella she had long golden hair and big blue eyes that sparkled like
diamonds one day while taking a walk in the Royal Gardens she stumbled Upon A mysterious cave wow I've never seen this cave
before I wonder what's inside as she cautiously walked inside she saw a glowing magical Crystal without thinking she picked it
up and suddenly the world around her started to spin when she opened her eyes she found herself in a completely different
world where am I what happened just then a kind fairy appeared before her welcome to the Enchanted Forest my dear you're here because of the magical
Crystal you picked up it has transported you to this world but how do I go back to my kingdom to return to your kingdom you must find
the magical flower that only blooms in the heart of the forest it's guarded by a f do dragon but don't worry I'll be
with you every step of the way thank you fery let's go find that flow and so Isabella and the fairy set out on a journey through the Enchanted
Forest along the way they encountered many magical creatures such as stalking animals fairies and even a unicorn wow W this is amazing I never
knew such a magical world existed yes it's a world full of Wonders and Adventures after many trials and tribulations they finally reached the
heart of the forest where they saw the dragon guarding the magical flow oh no how are we going to get past the dragon don't worry Isabella I have a
plan you distract the dragon and I'll grab the flour for you okay I'll try my best as Isabella started to distract the
dragon the fairy swiftly snatched the flour and handed it to Isabella we did it now how do we go back to my kingdom
just hold the flow and wish to go back to your kingdom Isabella closed her eyes and wished with all her heart to go back
to her kingdom when she opened her eyes she found herself back in her own world holding the magical flow thank you fairy
for all your help I'll never forget this magical Adventure the moral of the story is that you must always believe in the magic
within you and never give up on your dreams with perseverance and determination anything thing and everything is possible wow that was a
wonderful story it surely did give me a lot of confidence thanks Tia the dragon is your science project and the Magical flow is your
dream come on now let's get you all prepped up for the fifth attempt at the project yay I will pass it this time thanks Tia [Music]
dear this year's Treasure Hunt is tough I don't think I can do it anymore you're giving up Too Soon Tofu don't you want
to be the school president I want to but there is a lot of competition this year I'm not sure if I can do it and it's
really complicated too well if you never try you never know we must be courageous and determined while taking up
challenges just like princess Leela and little Ava did who are they come on I'll tell you the Golden
Lion once upon a time in a far off Kingdom there lived a beautiful princess named Leela she was kind smart and loved
by all the people in her kingdom one day while walking in the forest she met a little girl named Ava she had never seen her before and
asked her where she came from I come from a village far away from here I was sent in a quest to find the legendary
character the Golden Lion who is set to live deep in the forest the Golden Lion I've never heard of him before he is a
legendary character that has been around for many years he is known to be the wisest and most powerful creature in the
land it is said that whoever finds him and earns his trust will be granted three wishes Leela was intrigued and decided to join Ava on her request to
find the Golden Lion they traveled through the forest facing many obstacles along the way one night they found themselves lost
and alone in the dark Forest suddenly they heard a loud noise and saw a group of creatures approaching them who are you and what are you doing
in our territory we are on a quest to find the Golden Lion we mean no harm the Golden Lion no one has ever seen him
you're wasting your time despite the statement AA was more determined than ever we won't give up until we find him
the creatures were impressed by Ava's determination and decided to help them they gave them food and shelter for the
night and pointed them in the direction of the Golden Lion finally after many days of traveling they reached the
golden Lion's cave they were nervous but AA and Leela summoned all their courage and went inside who dares to enter my cave it is
it is me aa and my friend princess Leela we have come to seek your guidance the Golden Lion appeared in front of them
and they were in awe he was Majestic with golden fur and piercing green eyes what do you seek we seek your wisdom oh great Golden Lion we want to
know the secrets of the universe and we also seek your blessings very well I will give you what you seek But first
you must prove your worthiness you must complete three tasks the first task was to find a rare flower that bloomed only
on the highest mountain peak the second task was to collect a pearl from the deepest part of the ocean and the third
task was to retrieve a feather from a legendary bird that lived in a far off land Ava and Leela set out on their tasks determined to prove their
worthiness they faced many challenges along the way but they never gave up finally they completed all the tasks and returned to the golden Lions
cave he was impressed by their determination and bravery and granted them their wishes as they were leaving Leela turned to the Golden
Lion thank you for your guidance oh great lion we will always remember your lessons of Courage determination and kind
kindness and with that they left the cave happy and fulfilled with a new found sense of purpose and strength wow that was a good story Tia
and what did you learn from it tofu I learned that determination and bravery can overcome even the most challenging obstacles and that kindness and
compassion can win over the hearts of even the most powerful creatures very well tofu now are you ready to take up the treasure hunt
challenge yes dear I can do it awesome big [Music] boy H what do we have today we've got some fried veggies and rice for dinner
what who eats vegetables I want to eat a burger tofu that's all we had in store today I can make you a burger tomorrow
let's eat this now but I don't want to eat it I wish we had something more delicious to [Music] eat tofu do you think you are behaving
in the right manner oh Tia I don't like this car anymore look at the paint it's all chipped off it looks like trash now
can we buy a new one tomorrow enough tofu you are being so ungrateful but dear tofu there are people who go on without food for days there are people
who don't even have a roof over their heads or enough clothing to cover themselves be grateful that you have more than enough hm I guess you are
right come on I will tell you a [Music] story The Wise child once upon a time there was an old man who was always unhappy and complaining about
everything he would complain about the weather his health and the people around him nothing seemed to make him happy H why is it so sunny
today oh Wise Old Man be thankful that the sun is finally shining after days of heavy rain the next day the old man sat under
the same tree and complained how weak he was ah look at my skinny arms I wish I could be stronger like I was before Oh
Wise Old Man be thankful for there are people who can't even do daily tasks like drinking water on their own go away you silly man I don't need your
advice and the old man complained every single day about one thing or another until One Fine Day a young boy visited
the old man and asked him why he was always unhappy oh why old man what makes you so unhappy I have nothing to be happy about
everything is terrible upon hearing this the young boy thought for a moment and then replied oh kind sir allow me to teach you a lesson really
let's see what you got to make me happy the young boy led the old man to a nearby park where they sat on on a bench
together the boy then asked the old man to close his eyes and think of all the things he was grateful for come on now sir close your eyes take
a deep breath and think and tell me about all the things that you're grateful for things that I'm grateful for M let me think the old man hesitated
at first but then started to think he thought about his family his home and his friends he thought about the food on his table and the clothes on his
back he thought about the sun and the stars and the beauty of nature as the old man opened his eyes he saw the world in a different light he
felt a sense of gratitude and happiness that he had never felt before for oh I have never felt so good in a long time
see you have so much to be thankful for it's all a matter of perspective thank you so much young boy you have been very
kind to me the old man felt ashamed for being so ungrateful and promised to change his ways from that day on he made efforts to
appreciate the little things in life and to be grateful for what he had ah look at the sun today it is so beautiful as time passed the old man
became happier and more content he no longer complained about everything and everyone around him he smiled more and
was grateful for each new day hello sir how are you today come my child come to me I feel like the happiest man on Earth thank you so much I'm so
glad the young boy continued to visit the old man and they spent many happy days together the boy taught the old man
many other valuable lessons and the Old Man became like a grandfather to him do you now understand what what difference
does being grateful make tofu yes dear I Now understand that happiness is a matter of perspective yes and we should always be
grateful for what we have instead of focusing on what we don't have we should appreciate the little things in life and
always be thankful for the people who love us [Music] guys let's finish our group project yes please I will collect the research
material no Jack I want to collect the research material and I want to do the craft work hey no I am good at craft
work let me do it what's going on guys Tia everybody wants to do the same thing nobody is ready to divide the tasks for
the group project what shall we do well then each one of you will lose marks in the finals if you work together you will
end up making the best group project but diaa come on guys let me tell you an interesting story yay a story yes a story would be helpful all right then
here we go the Hunter and the doves once upon a time in a distant land a flock of doves were flying in search of food they were led by their Noble king
after a long flight the doves grew tired and needed rest oh Noble King let's get some rest come on my fellow doves we've
come so far let's push a little further and find some food as the continued their flight one of them flew ahead and
discovered scattered rice grains under a magnificent banion tree look everyone I found food there are rice grains beneath the banion tree
the entire flock happily landed on the ground and began to eat the grains however their Joy was shortlived as a massive net suddenly fell upon them
trapping them all oh no we're trapped what do we do now do not lose hope my friends we shall find a way out of this situation just then they spotted a
hunter approaching them with a wicked grin delighted by his capture the hunter is coming what shall we do your majesty fear not my friends
we shall use our collective intelligence to escape this trap listen carefully the king Dove shared his plan with the other
doves while they listened carefully we shall all fly up together each clutching a portion of the net in our beaks the
strength of unity shall set us free once we escape we will decide on our next course of action now let us take flight
this is a smart idea let's go inspired by their King's words each Dove held onto the net tightly with their beaks
and flapped their wings with all their might lifting the net off the ground the hunter taken a back by the side chased them shouting in
frustration come back you foolish Birds how dare you escape undeterred the doves flew higher and higher over Hills and
Valleys until the hunter was out of sight yes we did it we escaped from the hunter indeed my friends we owe our freedom to our Unity but our journey
isn't over yet I know a friend nearby who can help us further let us fly to the hill where the mouse lives the doves
flew to a hill near a city of temples where the mouse resided what's that noise who's there dear friend it is me the king Dove we
are in great need of your help please come out and help us the mouse cautiously emerged from his hole witnessing the trapped doves oh no who
could have done such a thing to you Noble King King dve narrated the whole story explaining their predicament and their Reliance on the mouse's Aid how
terrible is that fear not for I shall help you escape from this trap the mouse began nibbling at the net around the
king but the king intervened no dear friend friend first set my followers free a true leader cannot enjoy Freedom while his subjects suffer the mouse
understood the king's selflessness and respected his request it nibbled at all the portions of the net freeing each Dove one by one including the king
himself thank you Noble Mouse We Are Forever grateful to you thank you for saving Our Lives oh my fellow beings it
was your Unity that helped you escape thank you my dear friend indeed strength lies in unity wow that was a beautiful
story Tia and what did you learn from it we are only as strong as we are united as weak as we are divided very well smart boy [Music]
